text: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَآ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ بِٱلسِّنِينَ وَنَقْصٍ مِّنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And We certainly seized the people of Pharaoh with years of famine and a deficiency in fruits that perhaps they would be reminded.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya Kami telah menghukum (Fir'aun dan) kaumnya dengan (mendatangkan) musim kemarau yang panjang dan kekurangan buah-buahan, supaya mereka mengambil pelajaran.
